properties.headline: Remembrance Day - Wednesday 11 November - COONABARABRAN John Street at Dalgarno Street
properties.otherAdvice:
John St (Newell Hwy) will be closed in both directions between Edwards St and Essex St from approximately 10:50am to 11:10am to support a Remembrance Day event at the Clock Tower Memorial roundabout at Dalgarno St.

Other local roads which feed onto John St will also be closed and detours will be in place.

Motorists should allow extra travel time and follow the direction of traffic controllers.

properties.headline: State of Origin - Wednesday 11 November - SYDNEY OLYMPIC PARK M4 Mwy, Homebush Bay Dr, Parramatta Rd, Centenary Dr approaching ANZ Stadium
properties.publicTransport: Route 525 and 526 buses will be diverting around closures in Sydney Olympic Park. Visit transportnsw.info to plan your trip.
properties.otherAdvice:
State of Origin Game II at ANZ Stadium, Olympic Park kick off from 8:10pm until 10:10pm approx.

Traffic will be heavier than usual as up to 40,000 fans travel to Olympic Park during the already busy Wednesday evening peak. Motorists should allow extra travel time on major roads approaching the precinct including the M4 Mwy, Homebush Bay Dr, Concord Rd, Lane Cove Rd, Parramatta Rd, Centenary Dr and Silverwater Rd.

Roads in the precinct will begin closing from 11am on game day with some roads closing the night before as well. Closures will be in place on sections of Olympic Blvd, Showground Rd, Murray Rose Ave, Dawn Fraser Ave and other local roads.

Fans are encouraged to arrive early and pre-book parking online ahead of time (available until 23:59 Tuesday 10 November)

arrangementElements.html:
From 7:30pm Tuesday 10 November until 2am Thursday 12 November   

  • Dawn Fraser between Olympic Boulevard and Showground Road

From 10pm Tuesday 10 November until 2am Thursday 12 November

  • Olympic Boulevard from Herb Elliot Avenue to Kevin Coombs Avenue  

From 11am Wednesday 11 November until 2am Thursday 12 November

  • Grand Parade from Australia Avenue to Olympic Boulevard
  • Showground Road from Grand Parade to Herb Elliott Avenue (Novotel Loading Dock)
  • Dawn Fraser from Showground Road to Park Street
  • Murray Rose Avenue from Showground Road to Park Street
  • Olympic Boulevard from Herb Elliot Avenue to Sarah Durack Avenue
  • Shane Gould Avenue from P2A to Olympic Boulevard
  • Herb Elliot Avenue from Olympic Boulevard to Showground Road
  • Shirley Strickland Avenue from Rod Laver Drive to Olympic Blvd
  • Shirley Strickland Avenue from Olympic Boulevard to the M4 Exit (P4 car park)
  • Rod Laver Drive from Shirley Strickland to the Tennis Centre  
  • Kevin Coombs Avenue from Australia Avenue to Pondage Link (westbound)

From 6pm Wednesday 11 November until 2am Thursday 12 November

  • Kevin Coombs Avenue from Australia Avenue to Pondage Link (eastbound)

From 9pm until 11:30pm Wednesday 11 November (*buses excepted)

  • Dawn Fraser Avenue from Park Street to Australia Avenue *
  • Murray Rose Avenue from Park Street to Australia Avenue *
  • Herb Elliot Avenue from Park Street to Showground Road
  • Edwin Flack Avenue from Birnie Avenue to Old Hill Link (northbound)
  • Edwin Flack Avenue from Pondage Link to Old Hill Link (westbound)

properties.headline: Melbourne Cup Day - Tuesday 3 November - RANDWICK Anzac Pde, Alison Rd, High St approaching Royal Randwick Racecourse
properties.publicTransport: Visit transportnsw.info to plan your trip.

arrangementAttachments.displayName: Randwick Race Day Special event clearways
arrangementAttachments.fileName: Randwick Race Course Everest Day 17 Oct.pdf
arrangementAttachments.linkName: Randwick Race Day Special event clearways

properties.otherAdvice:
Melbourne Cup Day at Royal Randwick Racecourse, first race from 11:55am. 

Traffic may be heavier on roads around the racecourse including Anzac Pde, Doncaster Ave, High St, Alison Rd and Darley Rd as event goers travel to and from the event.

Special event clearway parking restrictions will be in effect on sections of Darley Rd from 4am to 7pm, Ascot St from 8am to 7pm and High St from 3pm to 7pm.

Clearways are strict no-parking zones, and apply even for local residents and RMS Mobility Scheme Permit holders. Check signs carefully as vehicles left in clearways will be towed and a fee applies.

arrangementElements.html:
Special event clearways are strict no-parking zones, and apply even for local residents and RMS Mobility Scheme Permit holders. Check signs carefully as vehicles left in clearways will be towed and a fee applies. If your vehicle is towed call 132 701 to find its new location.

RANDWICK 

FROM 4AM TO 7PM

  • Darley Rd between Alison Rd and roundabout to Centennial Park (western side)

FROM 8AM TO 7PM

  • Ascot St between Doncaster Ave and the roundabout at the racecourse (both sides)

FROM 3PM TO 7PM

  • High St between the gate 2 entry to UNSW and Anzac Pde (southern side)
arrangementElements.title: Special Event Clearways

roads.mainStreet: Anzac Pde, Alison Rd, High St
